multi.fieldDescription: Click '+' to add a more content fragment sources
Click '+' to add a more inline data

openInNewWindow.fieldDescription: Check to open link in new tab
openInNewWindow.name: ./linkOpenInNewWindow

imageSide.fieldDescription: Swap the image and the text from the default left. this will be used for types:-Article, Card, Block
imageSide.name: ./imageSide

parallaxOn.fieldDescription: Check to turn on Parallax (beta may break)
parallaxOn.name: ./parallaxOn

animationOn.fieldDescription: Check to turn on Animations (beta may break)
animationOn.name: ./anamationOn

multi.fieldDescription: Click add to add a more Dynamic Content fields
